about_the_game:
DISCORD CHANNEL

ABOUT THIS GAME

Late Shift is a realistic horror serial killer escape simulator. In one of the night shifts you will be kidnapped and trapped in the house of a crazy serial killer. Your goal is to find a way to escape from the madman.

Save yourself as much as you can. The house and the area around it is a living sandbox with many possibilities - do whatever you can to survive. Will you hide in the shadows and slip away undetected, or will you turn the situation around by using the butcher's traps against him? The choice is yours, and the AI will react dynamically to it.

content_descriptors.notes:
Violence:
Yes, the game does have very violent and gory scenes of violence. This includes depictions of bloodshed, mutilation, and brutal instances of combat. It shall be sprayed with horrific imagery—such as dismembered bodies, splattering blood, and realistic wounds.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 2 GB or Radeon R7 360, 2 GB or Intel Arc A310, 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Low 720p @ 30 FPS, DX11, Ray Tracing OFF

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660, 6 GB or AMD Radeon RX Vega 56, 8 GB or Intel Arc A580, 8GB, RTX 3050 laptop

short_description: Late Shift is a first-person horror game. Immerse yourself in a realistic thriller and try to escape the death that follows your life as a night shift worker at a gas station.
